Name: Blood Luck
Description: When a Blood Brother picks up a valuables token, all their abilities recharge.

Name: Blood Brother
Description:
The Band has four Brothers. Each Brother is a separate entity, tracking hp and effects separately. The Band is only defeated when all Brothers are defeated.
On each of the Band's turns, the Band acts with a different brother, until all have acted at least once. Ability recharge and interrupts are checked for each brother separately.
Each Brother has unique actions and a Bloodbound Blessing.

Name: Blessing Boots
Description: All remaining Brothers become sturdy and gain The Boot ability.

Name: Iron Fist
Description: Attacks against bloodied foes daze them, hit or miss.

Name: Blessing Fixer
Description: One brother can use Garrote once per round.

Name: Blessing Filth
Description: All remaining Brothers gain the Venom Blade trait.

Name: Blessing Cats
Description: All Brothers gain one use of the Feline Felicity interrupt.

Name: Cheaper Trick
Description: When missed by an attack, shove foe 2, teleport 2, and deal 2 damage.

Name: Blessing Pale
Description: All Brothers go to speed 6 and gain phasing.

Name: Blessing Sharp
Description: All Brothers gain the Overdrive 4 trait.

Name: Blessing Fanatic
Description: One brother can use Spark once a round.

Name: Blood Pact
Description: This character gains defiance at the start of their turn if there is a bloody character in range 3.

Name: Blessing Broker
Description: All Brothers gain Vigor 1 and Defiance.

Name: Blessing Monger
Description: All foes are marked by Bounty Hunt.
